A viable alternative is 8.Qd4,but I think Black can survive after 8...c5!(An exclamation mark may be a little exaggerative,but I think this relieves black's problems.8...c5 9.Nxd7+ Ke7 10.Qxc5+ Kd7 and I think Black is ok because a queen can't attack the king by itself.I feel this move is better because it brings another piece into the game and threatens 9.Nd5+
